reviewText:
Wendy Kaye & Christina Leardini are two of my all time top 5 playmates & at least one is in 8/13 clips so it's a min 4 stars right there.  Wendy Hamilton & Samantha Doorman are two of the ones I get most tired of & at least one of them is in 8/13 clips so I can't quite justify the full 5 stars given my personal taste.  Let's call it 4.5

Winter Heat - Julie Strain - ok
Wild Life - Corinna Harney, Wendy Kaye, Samantha Doorman - good clip
Well Oriented - Christina Leardini & Morgan Fox - good clip
Club Fantasy - Kaye, Harney, Doorman, Wendy Hamilton - good clip.
Paradise Found - Leardini, Kaye, Fox - good clip
Inspirations -  Leardini, Fox, Stacy Arthur - good clip
8  - Deborah Driggs, Hamilton - B&W & doesn't do much for me.
Ancient Wonders - Driggs, Fox, Brittany York, Hamilton - ok clip
Red Heat - Leardini, Fox, Hamilton - good clip
Lingerie Ole - Leardini, Hamilton - good clip
Cabaret Lingerie - Leardini, Kaye, Harney, Doorman - great clip, best of video.
Polar Bare - Strain, Monique Belligini, Melissa Moore - good clip
Autumn Glory - Samantha Doorman - see above comment - time to rewind the tape for me.

Playboy - Sexy Lingerie IV is fifty-six minutes and was released on video on February 11, 199. The word lingerie seldom applies to this video. The producer, Michael Trikilis, must have put the wrong title on the video. I saw very little lingerie on the Playmates and models and that left me wondering why they called it volume four. The twelve segments are a little longer then the previous three volumes. Here are my comments on them.

Winter Heat-More on nudity and skin and very little on lingerie
Wild Life-Three females with little or no lingerie on
Well Oriented-Full nudity and some lingerie
Club Fantasy-Starting a third into the segment, it is 60% nudity and 40% lingerie.
Paradise Found-Sexy, topless and fully nude
Inspirations-55% lingerie and 45% fully nude
Eight & 3/4 from lingerie to topless to full nudity in the fantasy, twice
Ancient Wonders-Full nudity
Red Heat-A mixture of lingerie, nudity and skin
Lingerie Ole'-A mixture of lingerie, nudity and skin
Cabaret Lingerie
Polar Bare-Lingerie at last
Autumn Glory-Topless, to full nudity, to topless and finally fully nude

This time around we have a bunch of new beauties with only three old ones.

Stacy Arthur-Playboy Playmate of the Month for January 1991
Samantha Dorman-Playboy Playmate of the Month for September 1991
Deborah Driggs-Playboy Playmate of the Month for March 1990, featured in volume two and three
Morgan Fox-Playboy Playmate of the Month for December 1990
Wendy Hamilton-Playboy Playmate of the Month for December 1991
Corinna Harney-Playboy Playmate of the Month for August 1991 & Playboy Playmate of the Year for 1992
Wendy Kaye Lawrence-Playboy Playmate of the Month for July 1991
Christina Leardini-Playboy Playmate of the Month for April 1991, featured in volume three
Brittany York-Playboy Playmate of the Month for October 1990

Models

Monique Biffignani
Melissa Moore
Julia Strain-Julie Strain-Penthouse Pet of the Month for June 1991 & Pet of the Year in 1993, featured in volume three

This is an excellent sexy video watch, but the lingerie is mostly missing from it. Playboy - Sexy Lingerie IV only gets a B.

This was a good video if, like me, you are a fan of Julie Strain.
She is wearing black stockings and looks great.
